00040   class ER_Handler {
00041     // Private vars
00042     protected $errorsToDisplay; 
00043     protected static $instance; 
00046     // Private functions
00047 
00064     protected function log($severity, $source, $message, $hint="") {
00065       // Check presence of mandatory args
00066       if (empty($source) || empty($message) || empty($severity)){
00067         $tmpmsg="Cannot display error, wrong format.";
00068         $tmphint="Check how you called this log function !";
00069         $this->log("critical", "log", $tmpmsg, $tmphint);
00070         return false;
00071       }
00072 
00073       // Clean the messages
00074       $source=htmlentities($source);
00075       $message=htmlentities($message);
00076       $hint=htmlentities($hint);
00077 
00078       // Finally, add the error message to the array for later
00079       // displaying by displayEvents() !
00080       $this->errorsToDisplay[$severity][]=array($source, $message, $hint);
00081       return true;
00082     }
00083 
00095     protected function displayEventBlock($crit, $critTitle) {
00096       // If this category's array is not empty, display its content.
00097       if (!empty($this->errorsToDisplay[$crit])) {
00098         echo "  <!-- $critTitle -->\n";
00099         echo "  <h3>$critTitle</h3>\n";
00100         echo "  <dl>\n";
00101         foreach($this->errorsToDisplay[$crit] as $anEvent){
00102           echo "    <dt>\n";
00103           echo "      <strong>".$anEvent[0]."</strong>\n";
00104           echo "      ".$anEvent[1]."\n";
00105           echo "      <dd>".$anEvent[2]."</dd>\n";
00106           echo "    </dt>\n";
00107         }
00108         echo "  </dl>\n";
00109       }
00110     }
00111 
00120     protected function __construct() {
00121       $this->clearEvents();
00122     }    
00123 
00124     // Public functions
00125     
00140     public function getInstance() {
00141       if (ER_Handler::$instance==null) {
00142         ER_Handler::$instance=new ER_Handler();
00143       }
00144       return ER_Handler::$instance;
00145     }
00146     
00163     function logCrit($source, $message, $hint="") {
00164       return $this->log("critical", $source, $message, $hint);
00165     }
00166 
00183     function logError($source, $message, $hint="") {
00184       return $this->log("error", $source, $message, $hint);
00185     }
00186 
00203     function logInfo($source, $message, $hint="") {
00204       return $this->log("info", $source, $message, $hint);
00205     }
00206 
00224     function logDebug($source, $message, $hint="") {
00225       return $this->log("debug", $source, $message, $hint);
00226     }
00227 
00233     function clearEvents() {
00234       // This function inits and clears the events array
00235       $this->errorsToDisplay=array(
00236                                "debug" => array(),
00237                                "info" => array(),
00238                                "error" => array(),
00239                                "critical" => array()
00240                              );
00241     }
00242 
00251     function displayEvents() {
00252       // If no event was registered, do nothing and return false
00253       if (empty($this->errorsToDisplay))
00254         return false;
00255 
00256       // Begin the events block
00257       echo "<!-- Begin events block -->\n";
00258       echo "<div class=\"events_block\">\n";
00259       echo "  <h2>Informations</h2>\n";
00260 
00261       $this->displayEventBlock("debug","Debug messages");
00262       $this->displayEventBlock("info","Informative messages");
00263       $this->displayEventBlock("error","Errors");
00264       $this->displayEventBlock("critical","Critical errors");
00265 
00266       // End the events block
00267       echo "</div>\n";
00268       echo "<!-- End events block -->\n";
00269     }
00270   } // class ER_Handler
